title: The best of Paul Smith’s cycling range: Fashion but make it cycling
content:
Cyclist
The best of Paul Smith’s cycling range: Fashion but make it cycling

Alongside his fashion range, Paul Smith is renowned for his love of cycling. This is evident on his brand’s website, with Cycling taking pride of place alongside Tailoring on the home page.

Delve down and there’s a wide array of cycling options on sale, often created in collaboration with big name cycling brands such as Rapha, Hiplok and Kask, but with a stylish designer twist to the standard item. Paul Smith also sells cycling artwork to burnish the cyclist’s living space.

The Paul Smith cycling collection is a classy take on the standard cycling ranges that would make a great gift for a cyclist, or for yourself if you are that cyclist.

Best of the Paul Smith cycling collection

  1. Cycling Musette Bag: Buy now from Paul Smith for £25
  2. PS Logo Cycling Socks: Buy now from Paul Smith for £20
  3. ‘Blue Gradient’ Protone Cycling Helmet: Buy now from Paul Smith for £250
  4. Pro Team Powerweave Cycling Shoes: Buy now from Paul Smith for £295
  5. ‘Cycling Caps’ T-Shirt: Buy now from Paul Smith for £65
  6. ‘Anatomy Of A Bike’ Signed Print by David Sparshott (unframed): Buy now from Paul Smith for £55

Best Paul Smith deals: Cyclist’s picks

1. Cycling Musette Bag

£25 | View offer

Carry your lunch in style with this Paul Smith-branded musette, made from a polyester/cotton blend fabric. A press stud closure helps keep your food in place as you ride.

As well as blue, there are navy and multicolour options, all coming with Paul Smith team print detailing and a hill climb logo on the rear.

  • Buy now from Paul Smith for £25

2. PS Logo Cycling Socks

£20 | View offer

With a stylish design incorporating the Paul Smith logo, these cycling socks are made in Italy from polyamide with 3 percent elastane for a comfortable fit. With three colours available, there’s a design to match your outfit.

Availability is in three sizes, for UK shoe sizes from 4 all the way up to 13.

  • Buy now from Paul Smith for £20

3. ‘Blue Gradient’ Protone Cycling Helmet

£250 | View offer

The Blue Gradient option is one of six block or gradient colour options available for this Paul Smith edition of the Kask Protone helmet. As you’d expect, the helmet is full featured with 14 vents, including two very large rear exhaust vents. It also has removable padding, a chin pad on the strap and a rubberised microdial adjuster, alongside the Paul Smith logo at the rear.

The Paul Smith Protone helmet is available in three sizes to fit heads from 50cm to 62cm in circumference, with a claimed weight of 230g for a medium size.

  • Buy now from Paul Smith for £250

4. Pro Team Powerweave Cycling Shoes

£295 | View offer

Paul Smith has collaborated with Rapha on this limited edition design of the Rapha Powerweave cycling shoes, which is completed by an ‘Artist Stripe’ front strap and Paul Smith branding at the rear.

It’s a performance cycling shoe, with a carbon sole unit, woven polyester upper, two Boa closures and an antimicrobial EVA insole. There’s a wide range of sizes available, with half sizes between 40.5 and 45.5.

  • Buy now from Paul Smith for £295

5. ‘Cycling Caps’ T-Shirt

£65 | View offer

Decorated with an array of cycling caps, this Paul Smith tee shirt has a regular fit for off-bike comfort and is made from soft 100 percent organic cotton.

Alongside the black version, there’s a white option available as well. Machine washable, it’s available in sizes S to XXL.

  • Buy now from Paul Smith for £65

6. ‘Anatomy Of A Bike’ Signed Print by David Sparshott (unframed)

£55 | View offer

This stylish artwork is ideal for a bike lover’s hallway, bedroom or pain cave. It breaks down in meticulous detail all the parts of a traditional bike from the steel frame, via the quill stem and downtube Campagnolo shifters to the headset spacers.

It’s the product of Suffolk-based artist David Sparshott, signed by him and printed on A2 Hahnemuhle German Etching paper. It ships unframed in a cardboard poster tube.

  • Buy now from Paul Smith for £55

Looking for more cycling deals? Check out our main best cycling deals page.

author: pnorman
